title: Daniel and Drago
description: King Daniel, Prince Drago, and Chief Dick go together on an epic journey to save the Helds and Daniel's father from the Lavadan tribe, who throw their prisoners into the volcano to their god - the dragon of lava. But the Lavadans aren't the only enemy... Will King Daniel deal with royal intrigues? Will he be able to save his father and maintain his kingdom at the same time? Find out how to befriend an enemy together with Daniel von Alden! The book was written in English by the 17-year-old Georgian author.
author: Tamuna Tsertsvadze
